attributes.action: increase the wages of British Troops to a level which is fair for the risks they take for our country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to try and bring to attention the low level of pay which is roughly £33.73 a day! I do not feel that this is enough for the job that they do and i'm sure that I am not the only one.
We see footballers prancing around on a football field earning millions for kicking a football so why can't someone who is risking their life to save and preserve this country earn more money...I know that paying each soldier millions is not going to happen but they should be paid more than what they are currently earning! They are our heroes and they deserve the best!!
